tool_description: 2Captcha is a human-powered image and CAPTCHA recognition service. 2Captcha's main purpose is solving your CAPTCHAs in a quick and accurate way by human employees, but the service is not limited only to CAPTCHA solving. You can convert to text any image that a human can recognize.
name: 2Captcha
title: 2Captcha

api_list.name: reCAPTCHA V2 Enterprise
api_list.description: Token-based method for automated solving of reCAPTCHA V2 Enterprise.

required_parameters.name: google_key
required_parameters.description: reCAPTCHA sitekey. Can be found inside `data-sitekey` property of the reCAPTCHA `div` element or inside `k` parameter of the requests to reCAPTHCHA API. You can also use the [script](https://gist.github.com/2captcha/2ee70fa1130e756e1693a5d4be4d8c70) to find the value.

required_parameters.name: page_url
required_parameters.description: The full URL of target web page where the captcha is loaded. We do not open the page, not a problem if it is available only for authenticated users

api_list.name: reCAPTCHA V3
api_list.description: Token-based method for automated solving of reCAPTCHA V3.

required_parameters.name: google_key
required_parameters.description: reCAPTCHA sitekey. Can be found inside `data-sitekey` property of the reCAPTCHA `div` element or inside `k` parameter of the requests to reCAPTHCHA API. You can also use the [script](https://gist.github.com/2captcha/2ee70fa1130e756e1693a5d4be4d8c70) to find the value.

required_parameters.name: page_url
required_parameters.description: The full URL of target web page where the captcha is loaded. We do not open the page, not a problem if it is available only for authenticated users

api_list.name: hCaptcha
api_list.description: Token-based method to bypass hCaptcha. The method is quite similar to reCAPTCHA V2. The token can be used on the target website inside h-captcha-response form field or passed to a callback function. It's recommended to use the userAgent value together with the token.

required_parameters.name: website_key
required_parameters.description: hCaptcha sitekey. Can be found inside `data-sitekey` property of the hCaptcha `div` element or inside `sitekey` parameter of the requests to hCaptcha API

required_parameters.name: page_url
required_parameters.description: The full URL of target web page where the captcha is loaded. We do not open the page, not a problem if it is available only for authenticated users

api_list.name: Cloudflare Turnstile
api_list.description: Token-based method to bypass Cloudflare Turnstile. Both the standalone captcha and challenge mode are supported.

required_parameters.name: page_url
required_parameters.description: The full URL of target web page where the captcha is loaded. We do not open the page, not a problem if it is available only for authenticated users

required_parameters.name: user_agent
required_parameters.description: User-Agent of your browser. Use only modern browsers. We recommend to use versions released in the last 6 months
required_parameters.default: Mozilla/5.0 (Windows NT 10.0; Win64; x64) AppleWebKit/537.36 (KHTML, like Gecko) Chrome/122.0.0.0 Safari/537.36

required_parameters.name: website_key
required_parameters.description: Turnstile sitekey. Can be found inside `data-sitekey` property of the Turnstile `div` element

api_list.name: reCAPTCHA V2
api_list.description: Token-based method for automated solving of reCAPTCHA V2.

required_parameters.name: page_url
required_parameters.description: The full URL of target web page where the captcha is loaded. We do not open the page, not a problem if it is available only for authenticated users

required_parameters.name: google_key
required_parameters.description: reCAPTCHA sitekey. Can be found inside `data-sitekey` property of the reCAPTCHA `div` element or inside `k` parameter of the requests to reCAPTHCHA API. You can also use the [script](https://gist.github.com/2captcha/2ee70fa1130e756e1693a5d4be4d8c70) to find the value.

optional_parameters.name: is_invisible
optional_parameters.description: Pass `true` for Invisible version of reCAPTCHA - a case when you don't see the checkbox, but the challenge appears. Mostly used with a callback function
